titleStmt.title: Characters of true blessednesse delivered in a sermon preached at Saint Maries Church in Dover. Sep. 21. 1637. At the funeral of Mrs. Alice Percivall, wife of Anthony Percivall Esquire. By Iohn Reading.
titleStmt.author: Reading, John, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. G[riffin] for Ioyce Norton and Ric. Whitakers, at the signe of the Kings Armes in Saint Pauls Church yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
